HeroSection.title: Create your professional portfolio without spending anything
HeroSection.text: Create your stunning portfolio website completely free. No hidden fees, no credit card required - just pure value for freelancers.

featuresSection.title: Everything You Need, Free
featuresSection.subtitle: We believe every freelancer deserves a professional online presence. That's why we made our portfolio builder completely free.

feature1.title: 100% Free Forever
feature1.description: Create and maintain your professional portfolio completely free. No hidden costs or premium features.

feature2.title: SEO Optimized
feature2.description: Get discovered by customers with our built-in SEO tools. Rank higher in search results naturally.

feature3.title: Extremely Fast
feature3.description: Built with Next.js for stunning performance that pleases visitors and search engines.

feature4.title: Safe & Reliable
feature4.description: Your portfolio is protected with enterprise-level security and hosted on reliable infrastructure.

feature5.title: Beautiful Templates
feature5.description: Choose from our collection of professionally designed templates that make your work shine.

feature6.title: Quick Setup
feature6.description: Get your portfolio online in minutes with our intuitive process. No technical knowledge required.

pricingSection.title: Choose Your Plan
pricingSection.subtitle: Find the perfect plan to match your needs

comingSoonSection.title: Enhance Your Freelance Business
comingSoonSection.subtitle: Get early access to our upcoming premium features designed to help you manage your freelance business like a pro.

feature1.title: Income Management
feature1.description: Track your earnings, expenses, and profit margins in real-time.

feature2.title: Client Management
feature2.description: Manage client information, projects, and communication in one place.

feature3.title: Invoice Generation
feature3.description: Create and send professional invoices with automated reminders.

feature4.title: Financial Reports
feature4.description: Gain insights into your business with detailed financial analytics.

feature5.title: Project Planning
feature5.description: Schedule projects, set milestones, and track deadlines efficiently.
